divs: Sighting Detailsfollowed me home from approximately 3 miles. It maintained the same distance from me the whole time. Could not make out shape, but it had several colors. It seemed to fluctuate its colors as if it was rotating... It stayed suspended near my home for about an hour before it very slowly lowered behind the treeline.
Summary: Several flashing lights, followed me home and maintained same distance
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around February 1st 2010
